Title: Requires all state entities to notify affected individuals in the event of a data breach where information is compromised
Summary: Requires all state entities, including local governments, to notify affected individuals in the event of a data breach where information is compromised; defines "cybersecurity incident".
LawCode: Amd ยง208, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to prompt notification to affected individuals in the event of a data breach within certain state entities
